    • HttpHandler

      public HttpHandler​(java.lang.String _strWebRoot, java.lang.String name) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException

      Parameters:
      _strWebRoot - String representation of web root
      name - Server name
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - Throws if webroot does not exists
